channel.title: Help
channel.description:
a few questions here.
1)how do i make the money green for 10m+ and white for 100k-9,999,999gp
2)how do i make it so when i click on the clan chat, it actually opens it.
3)from above, how would i make buttons work?

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

You would have to make a custom clan chat interface in the sprites file. Then you would have to write a code for the sprite to be recognized as a splash screen. Then make the extra tab work for the clan chat interface.

If you need the sprites writing code. It’s:

public Sprite(String s) {
try {
FileInputStream fis = new FileInputStream("./Sprites/"+s+".dat");
byte[] b = new byte[fis.available()];
fis.read(b);
fis.close();
Stream stream = new Stream(b);
myWidth = stream.readUnsignedWord();
myHeight = stream.readUnsignedWord();
myPixels = new int[myWidth * myHeight];
for(int i = 0; i < b.length - 2; i++) {
myPixels[i] = b[i + 2];
}
} catch (Exception e) {
e.printStackTrace();
}

}

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

  1. Go into the Client’s file “client.java” and search for "+ s.substring(0, s.length() - 8) + " million "
    and make it say…
    s = “@gre@” + s.substring(0, s.length() - 8) + " million @gre@(" + s + “)”;
    and for the 100k
    search for "+ s.substring(0, s.length() - 4) + "K "
    s = “@Whi@” + s.substring(0, s.length() - 4) + “K @whi@(” + s + “)”;

  2. Create a Clan Chat Interface with a Splash Screen

  3. Make action buttons on the splash screen.

Read full topic
